Indian Startup Ecosystem Sees Record Funding Despite Global Slowdown

Despite global economic uncertainties, India‚Äôs startup ecosystem has demonstrated remarkable resilience with record-breaking funding in the third quarter of 2025. Investors continue to show strong confidence in Indian entrepreneurs and innovation.

The funding was led by technology, fintech, and e-commerce sectors. Several startups achieved unicorn status, bringing India‚Äôs total unicorn count to over 150. Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities are emerging as new startup hubs.

Experts attribute this success to India‚Äôs large market, digital adoption, and government support through initiatives like Startup India.
